derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin demulcent- 'stroking caressingly', from the verb demulcere, from de- 'away' + mulcere 'soothe'

means.word_mean: 1. a medication (in the form of an oil or salve etc.) that soothes inflamed or injured skin
1. having a softening or soothing effect especially to the skin
